data.prayer: Father, we ask for 931 new simple churches in the state of Louisiana, United States. Place a simple church in every community of the 4,658,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Louisiana, United States
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,230,080 believers in Louisiana, United States to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Louisiana, United States to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Louisiana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Louisiana, United States a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Louisiana, United States the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 1,230,080 believers in Louisiana, United States.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

location.name: Louisiana
location.cities_list: New Orleans, Baton Rouge, Shreveport, Metairie Terrace, Metairie
location.cities_list_w_pop: New Orleans (389,617), Baton Rouge (228,590), Shreveport (197,204), Metairie Terrace (142,489), Metairie (138,481)
